    public class FrameSpectra
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class FrameSpectra is the class representing the spectra management window
    See Also:

      • getValuesMinMaxNames

        public java.util.Vector getValuesMinMaxNames(boolean minOrMax,
                                             boolean nameIsImportant,
                                             boolean showError)
        Gets the min, max and name values if checkboxs are selected
        Parameters:
        minOrMax - if false min AND max have to be correct
        nameIsImportant - if false the method will not check the name
        showError -
        Returns:
        a vector containing the arraylist of the names and the arraylist of the [min,max]
